meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Penny Citrola Paul Camp Vamsi Adusumilli Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6437.

td.p: Penny Citrola, an English language tutor originally from East Meadow, New York
Paul Camp, a letter carrier from Fort Wayne, Indiana
Vamsi Adusumilli, a marketing director originally from Columbia, Missouri (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,800)

tr.td: WHEELS OF FORTUNE
LAW & ORDER
FACE, THE NATION
STAR SEARCH
"EXTRA"
LONG-RUNNING TV

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
